title: Losing less LP the better you do.
body:
So i came across the idea when i was playing a game on my smurf, that even when i do good i still lose sometimes my fault sometimes not even though it can be a players fault they should be rewarded for doing good. Thats the s system but you could also -5 lp from the normal 18 to make it 13-. And you can minus 3- from 18 to make -15 for S-. And you can make it -7 lp from 18 for S+ while you still lose lp you do lose less for doing well.
Let me know what you guys think about this idea in the idea below.
